verses.verse: (Is. 6:9, 10) Let their eyes be darkened, so that they do not see; And make their loins shake continually.
((Jer. 10:25; 1 Thess. 2:16)) Pour out Your indignation upon them, And let Your wrathful anger take hold of them.
(Matt. 23:38; Luke 13:35; Acts 1:20) Let their dwelling place be desolate; Let no one live in their tents.
For they persecute the ones ((Is. 53:4; 1 Pet. 2:24)) You have struck, And talk of the grief of those You have wounded.
(Neh. 4:5; (Rom. 1:28)) Add iniquity to their iniquity, ((Is. 26:10)) And let them not come into Your righteousness.
